hint.text: Each of the groups 100-110, 110-120, etc in the frequency distribution table is called a class interval.

solution.text:
Let's consider the Class Interval \(100-110\).
Size of C.I. = Upper limit - Lower limit
\(=110-100\)
\(=10\)
Therefore, size of the Class Interval is \(10\).

content.text: What is the size of each Class Interval?
